Plot
Plagued by nightmares and her sister&#039;s suicide, Maria joins her friends on a 
road trip to a vacation home in a remote desert town. Once there, she finds 
herself hunted by El Charro (Andrew Bryniarski) - an ancient evil driven 
to exact a brutal revenge on Maria&#039;s lineage. The Curse of El Charro creates 
a world where 70&#039;s exploitation, 80&#039;s character based horror, and German 
Expressionist silent films can coexist against a backdrop of religious portends,
bizarre dreamscapes, and chicks covered in blood.
